formattedAddress: 150 W 25th St #604, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 150 W 25th St #604, New York, NY 10001-7404, USA

originalText.text: Working with Lindsay and her team has been an absolute pleasure. Their events are well planned and beautifully designed. There are always plenty of people to help throughout the day and well into the evening. Clients boast how helpful and empowering it is to work with the LLE team. Even as a vendor it is obvious they truly care about their clients and the importance of realizing their clients dreams through events and hospitality.

text.text: Working with Lindsay and her team has been an absolute pleasure. Their events are well planned and beautifully designed. There are always plenty of people to help throughout the day and well into the evening. Clients boast how helpful and empowering it is to work with the LLE team. originalText.text: Lindsay and her team are truly the best in the industry. We've attended many of their events and we are working with them to plan our wedding. They are experts in every detail of event planning and production. They understand how to make people feel comfortable and relaxed, and how to make them feel inspired and joyful, and how to bring them together to create unforgettable moments. They combine impeccable taste and creativity with amazing attention to detail on logistics, budgeting, communication, etc. They are also a dream to work with. We cannot recommend them enough.

text.text: Lindsay and her team are truly the best in the industry. We've attended many of their events and we are working with them to plan our wedding. originalText.text: I have worked with Lindsay and her team on several events, ranging from both social to corporate.  There are many ways to describe her and her team, but the one that sticks out in my mind is professional.  Events are always full of ups and downs and how you handle those show the caliber of who you are professionally and personally.  Lindsay handles all situations the same, with grace.  She is a consummate professional and on top of that her work is beautiful.

text.text: I have worked with Lindsay and her team on several events, ranging from both social to corporate. originalText.text: I️’ve loved working with Lindsay Landman and her team at bar and bat mitzvah celebrations she has produced for families in Manhattan and Westchester. Lindsay’s parties are beautiful, polished and personalized to her clients. She and her team are always buttoned up, in command and adept at responding to fluid situations. She’s a wonderful event industry colleague and it’s clear that she and her team give their all to their clients.

text.text: I️’ve loved working with Lindsay Landman and her team at bar and bat mitzvah celebrations she has produced for families in Manhattan and Westchester. Lindsay’s parties are beautiful, polished and personalized to her clients. She and her team are always buttoned up, in command and adept at responding to fluid situations. She’s a wonderful event industry colleague and it’s clear that she and her team give their all to their clients.

originalText.text:
As a guest of a recent wedding, the event planners we’re definitely lacking in many areas,  I dealt with Stefanie Zorn and she was not professional at all. The planners didn’t send out emails until after the event cut offs,  6 days past the day of hotel arrangements,, which left us in a hurry to figure it all out and in the end, it was taken care of very unprofessional. The lack of detail made things very hard for many of us guests, and when you are going to a destination wedding, details are very important. Sadly I’m not the only one who was effected,
Linda.
